tool_description: Ensure the integrity and reliability of your email data with our advanced Email Validator API. Designed to meet the evolving needs of businesses and developers, our API offers a multi-faceted approach to email validation, incorporating SMTP verification, MX record analysis, and disposable email detection. Say goodbye to bounced emails, improve deliverability rates, and maintain a clean and authentic email list effortlessly.
name: Email Validator API
title: Email Validator API

api_list.name: Check - Validate Email
api_list.description: Checks whether email is valid or not.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://email-validator-api3.p.rapidapi.com/email/validate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "email-validator-api3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://email-validator-api3.p.rapidapi.com/email/validate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "email-validator-api3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
